title: Dark Ink
description: I'm his muse. His addiction.Rian Merrick is a wildly talented tattoo artist, the unhinged “rockstar” professor on campus. Everyone's obsession. Now I’m his. He doesn’t care that I’m his student. He won’t stop til I belong to him and he’s ruined me.I’m trying to resist him—Lord knows, I’ve trying—but my body screams for him. Why do I ache for him even though I know it’s wrong? How can something that feels like Heaven be a sin?He thought I was his redemption.Instead, he will be my damnation.He’s a broken man with a dark price to pay—a price I can’t pay again. But that means when his demons come for him, can I let him go before he drowns us both?﻿﻿Author's note: this is a dark, angsty romance dealing with addiction and toxic relationships. If you don't like your heroes over-the-top and obsessive, and you don't like your spice "degrading" and "impactful", walk away. Otherwise, strap yourself in and grab onto your "oh shit" handle, this is a roller-coaster that won't stop til the bitter end...
author: Sienna Blake
